text: The Galileo Project is a research project at Harvard University. Its objective is to look for evidence of extraterrestrial technological presence on or near Earth. Its director is Professor Avi Loeb. The project was started in 2021. More than 100 scientists work on the project. The project has been written about in The Guardian, The New York Times, USA Today, Scientific American and other publications. ==References== Category:Harvard University
title: Galileo Project
